text:
Hi all! Here's the centralized, public jobs thread for developers & technical roles in the HubSpot community - *you can add any open roles there* and we'll be publicizing it on Twitter and in our newsletter later this month! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/HubSpot-Developer-and-Technical-Jobs-in-June/m-p/645926#M877>

We hope it helps you find and hire great talent!
